website_summaries.verdict: While this brace is designed for women, it works well for almost anyone except those with exceptionally large wrists.
pros: Fits those with small wrists better than other models

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but gets (and stays) dirty too quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these braces all the time because they're very comfortable to wear. But as you can see, I only gave it three stars for 2 reasons--1) the velcro wears out fairly quickly, and 2) and this is the big one--it gets so dirty, even if you wash it regularly (which makes the velcro wear out even faster) that you have a replace it frequently. Perhaps that's how they stay in business, since they are relatively inexpensive. Even just a dark gray color would be so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Its amazing. I would definitely recommend that anyone who have ...
customer_reviews.text: Since i got pregnant i have suffered from Carpel tunnel syndrome. In the mornings i could barely move my hands. I wear this at night i have one for the left hand and the right hand. I can feel my fingers again. Its amazing. I would definitely recommend that anyone who have numbness in fingers and pain in wrists to buy this. I am also very petite so to find a wrist support that fits is not easy. This fits. My only complaint is the color. I have to be really careful i take it off before i do any activities as it is cream. I would recommend you buy a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: SMSPlace

customer_reviews.title: This is the best wrist brace I've had even one given to me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wrist brace I've had even one given to me for an injury at the hospital. Usually have to remove one during the night and find them cumbersome during the day if you need to wear one. For the first time I can sleep in this brace all night and feel comfortable. I think the idea they are made for women help a great deal. I don't want to be without it any longer. Don't need it all the time but if you do I suggest you try this one. The name says it all, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: William Surovic

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and great for use during exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally in 2008 when I was going thru a spell of curling my wrist and fingers when I slept and they got numb. Wore this awhile til I broke the habit. Now I’m coming off a broken wrist and I wear this at night so I don’t accidentally wake myself up if I over twist the wrist. I teach aerobics as well and I use it to remind myself “don’t do something stupid” while I’m still rehabbing! Just ordered a second one because I sweat so much during my aerobic classes that I need a second one that’s dry. So comfortable and really holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: bifftex

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug, breathable fabric, and extremely well made!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wrist brace for how firmly yet comfortably it holds my wrist in place. Now I can continue with my daily tasks without feeling the continued pain from my sprained wrist. Note: this is made for the right hand only!
customer_reviews.author: jL

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.text: It's actually the best daytime wrist brace I've tried and I think I've tried them all, but I gave it 4 stars because after a half hour or so the metal brace in the palm side starts to really bother me. I suppose because it's doing what it's supposed to, pushing against my palm to keep that straight line, but it's pretty irritating, makes my palm itch and then hurt. Maybe more cushioning there would help?
customer_reviews.author: Wordsmith

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Itchy
customer_reviews.text: This brace is sturdy and does its job, if I can keep it on. Once the brace is on, the itching immediately starts. The first time I wore this, I had an awful blister that still itches when I put this brace on. This brace has to be going back. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine T

customer_reviews.title: Superior to other braces I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd daytime brace that i have tried. Superior in every aspect when compared to muellers and body glove comfort wrist brace. Has 2 firm stabilizers rather than one. Was hesitant in buying a white brace as stated in the question section but in reality the Brace is gray with white mesh over stabilizers. Didn’t want black for summertime wear. Very soft and comfortable and unlike the other braces fits the thumb better. Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for wearing to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have EDS-hypermobile joint type. I've owned dozens of braces and compression items. These braces are by far the most comfortable ones I own and the only ones I have been able to sleep through the night in. They provide adequate stability for light/moderate activities. I do have other ones if I will be doing heavy lifting or strenuous activities. These might work for these types of activities but I haven't tried them for such. My favorite thing about these is they are very comfortable and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping the wrist straight
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my right hand a couple years ago when I was having symptoms of carpal tunnel syndrome, and it was amazing. I am now nearly ready to deliver my first baby and just developed the same thing in my left wrist. I bought this because of my experience the first time, but this brace rubs against my wrist right below the thumb opening. The stitching is sticking up inside. I will try to shave it down with scissors, but they should use a less-abrasive thread in these. Everything else about it is exactly as I need.
customer_reviews.author: CMT926Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fits a woman's hand perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I spent some time at the local drugstore trying on all the choices in wrist supports and wasn't very happy with any of them do I decided to see what was available at Amazon. This one was BY FAR the best fitting, most comfortable one I tried on. I wear it only at night and got immediate relief from the first night on. Not only for my carpal tunnel issue but somehow helped my elbow too. One of the best investments I've ever made in a healthcare product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J

customer_reviews.title: The design is comfortable and provides excellent support
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for about 8 years. The fabric and construction are outstanding. The design is comfortable and provides excellent support. The color and detailing look nice enough that I can wear it in meetings and not feel like everyone is looking at it. The gray and white color scheme blends in better than black. The only thing I wish for is longer lasting velcro. With wear every night, it lasts about 1.5 years. A long time, but that's the only thing that has ever failed. Great job Wellgate!
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable!  Soft on the skin and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: These wrist braces are VERY comfortable. I wear them mostly at night while sleeping, and they are so comfortable that I don't even remember that I'm wearing them until the next morning. They fit well and are soft yet snug. I would probably wear these all the time, but due to their light color (white/gray) I feel they would need to be laundered quite often just from touching products, boxes and paperwork. I have not washed them, but am sure they will wash well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Holds well women wrists but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The brace is just the correct size for me. I bought another one previously and it was far too large for a woman. Pros: it holds perfectly the wrist Con's: the thumb opening is probably too high or narrow. It created a really bad cut at the joint of my thumb after only one hour of wearing it. Also I received it totally smashed and torn, although there was nothing in the box to do this. So I am not sure it was a new one or a return from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Helps with carpel tunnel!
customer_reviews.text: This product was for my wife. We recently found out she has carpel tunnel in her wrist so we've been searching for the best product we can find. This wrist support is great at easing the pain for her. She wears it to work everyday and she can easily type with it on. It provides great support for her wrist! The only thing that she says she doesn't like is it's a little too tight around her thumb area. We're hoping it'll wear in but she gets lines around her thumb from this. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Detromentum

customer_reviews.title: Why is the left so much more?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Light, good fit, comfortable. The only reason I’m giving it three stars, I ordered a right handed one by accident for the $5 (killer deal for the product.) When I put it on my left wrist I realized my mistake but of course when I went back to order another one the left wrist is 4x as much. So now I’m just wearing the right one on the left wrist. It’s awkward but I think it gets the job done and I’m not paying 4x the price for the left handed one, that’s kind of sucky.
customer_reviews.author: cassi

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Really Helps!
customer_reviews.text: The light gray and white is definitely more attractive than the typical ugly black brace (but bad if you are doing "dirty" work, like working as a grocery checker). My just-diagnosed carpal tunnel symptoms (caused by curling up my hands at night)--numbness, weakness, pain in my upper arm and shoulder--abated immediately after one night of use. This brace is not uncomfortable to sleep in, just a little awkward. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: West Seality

customer_reviews.title: Shaped like a hook and very painful to wear
customer_reviews.text: The plastic brace digs into the back of my wife's hand so badly that it is completely unwearable without leaving the top strap completely undone which defeats the purpose. She's never had a brace do this before. I can tell the splint is plastic, so I cannot bend it into a better position than the almost hook-like shape it is currently set to. Extremely disappointed. Will return for something that doesn't cause more damage to her hands. Too bad I can't give this a zero rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for arthritic hands. No neoprene!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me. I have arthritis in my hands which contributes to tingling and pain from my wrist to my fingers. I also have neoprene allergy and I had to have something without neoprene. This support is perfect. I sleep in it and have noticed an improvement in my fingers and wrist. Its comfy, not too hot to wear and provides great support.
customer_reviews.author: Hound lover

customer_reviews.title: Well made brace
customer_reviews.text: Had one I got in 1994 and still have it for my right wrist. Needed one for my left wrist. Not saying I used it daily for over 20 years but did use it off and on and it has held up. Very comfortable, easy to put on and a good fit for a small hand. Bought one from a grocery store and material between finger and thumb kept rubbing against thumb and hand part went up to my knuckles so it was hard to use my hand. With this brace on my small hand, I can still use my hand to type, eat, write, etc.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.57

customer_reviews.title: Dig in a little, I have rectified it with a little piece of cotton.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked to have given this a five star because it is hands-down the most comfortable support brace I’ve ever had, including any I bought on Amazon and including the one that my doctor had me fit it for. However I would like to see a little more padding around the same area because it does Dig in a little, I have rectified it with a little piece of cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Carpal Tunnel Support
customer_reviews.text: I sleep with these. These prevent that painful icy cold numb tingling sensation I used to get, and my hand strength is improved during the day. If I fall asleep without them, I am getting out of bed to go put them on. These have been a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: HHFeather828

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable wrist brace, helped my carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really comfortable brace. It's easy to put on and take off. I was worried the constant velcro usage would cause pilling on the surface, but so far, nothing. I was having some index finger numbness that I attributed to carpal tunnel and using this brace for a few weeks has fixed it! I'm really impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Wrist brace
customer_reviews.text: Works great for sore wrist (even to sleep with) - however, I had to go to the Dr for my sore wrist & found out it was actually tendinitis of the thumb! Stop using your thumbs to scroll your cell phones! Had to get a cortisone shot & a new brace from the Dr. This product does work for tired, achy wrists... (and cheaper than WalMart price)!!
customer_reviews.author: mjones

customer_reviews.title: Causes more pain, rubs so causes swelling and sensitivity so hurts like heck to take it off.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. Doesn’t do what it’s supposed to and actually adds to pain. Looks better in add than what you get stuck with. Still haven’t gotten my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Margo S.

customer_reviews.title: You really can wear it while typing and doing other normal activities!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by someone and I was really excited that it lived up to my expectations. I can comfortably type and use my computer mouse while wearing it. I can even crochet and knit with it on and I've never worn a brace that allowed that.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Powell

customer_reviews.title: Horribly uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of shocked at all of the 5-star reviews for this item. The fabric is horribly stiff and unyielding, plus a bit scratchy. It doesn't contour well to my wrist or hand. Cheap looking/feeling. Just not comfortable in any way -- went straight back into the box for a return.
customer_reviews.author: R&N

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wrist brace
customer_reviews.text: My favorite wrist brace by far. I'm always on my computer at work and at home as a full time student, and carpal tunnel is just part of the territory. This brace is great because it allows me to move enough to still type but reduces the pain. It's comfortable and adds enough support to ease the pain. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wrist brace for 4-5 years and it was time for a replacement. Searched in the usual spots and could not find it. Glad I found it on Amazon. My wrist is small and this is a little big, but it works. I have issues with my fingers going numb when I sleep and a wrist brace helps - about 95% of the time. The old brace was tossed in the washer and dryer a few times and I haven't experienced any issues. Since I only wear this when I sleep, I don't know what it feels like to wear this doing everyday tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Supportive yet pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I find these perfect for work. They're also great to use with crutches.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: I've tried a bunch...
customer_reviews.text: I have pretty painful wrists, and found that not much of what I'd tried for support worked until I found this. You honestly will not be sorry for purchasing should you suffer from arthritic wrists... relieves the horrid pain in just the right place and easy on easy off adjustable short stays that stay put!
customer_reviews.author: bon-bon

customer_reviews.title: Nicely fitted brace.
customer_reviews.text: It's a firm, supportive wrist support, and it helps when my wrist is giving me some trouble. It's comfortable enough to sleep in, though you have to work with it the first few times to find the adjustment level that is tight enough for support but not too tight to sleep comfortably. The thumb hole is a little tight the first time as well, but mine has loosened up from wear and is no longer uncomfortable. My hands are pretty small, so are my wrists, and it fits really well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn MTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great support to ease carpal tunnel pain & perfect for thinner wrists.
customer_reviews.text: I was having A LOT of wrist pain especially when using the mouse at work. It is a great fit for thinner wrists and really provides support for the wrist. I experience very little pain when wearing it. I can tell very quickly when I don't have it on while at work.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This is such a perfect size for women. I wear these every night to bed. I actually have a separate pair that I wear during the day that are black because I don't want to get these dirty. If they had a darker color, I would have purchased those as well. It's nice to have a set for day and a set for night.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: brace part is plastic, not metal
customer_reviews.text: This would be a perfect brace if the stiff part were metal but I have already had two of these break at the top. Not only is it plastic but thin plastic. I would rather pay a bit more for the metal insert. Other than that I find it comfotable enough to wear all the time, except when I will have my hands in water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne R. Knudson

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My hands are rather bid for a woman but this fits perfect and stabilizes my hand and wrist. I wear it at night and it has not been an issue at all. I injured the top of my hand and the wrist, it was not getting better, but have noticed a big difference since using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Downer

customer_reviews.title: Ladies get this one!
customer_reviews.text: I am fairly certain I have ulnar tendinitis and asked an orthopedic surgeon friend what he recommended. I am going to wear the brace for six weeks and do strengthening exercises in the evenings. Hopefully that will be the cure! The Wellgate wrist support fits perfectly and as soon as I started wearing it I felt almost instant relief. I can still type and do most things I could normally do it just gives my wrist and forearm stability and keeps them from twisting. It is well made and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and very annoying when I tried to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I found this super-uncomfortable... the thumb wrap was too loose, and very annoying when I tried to sleep. I tried cutting that piece out, which improved it somewhat. However, I still can't wear this -- the one time I managed it overnight, the wrist brace itself left a few raw spots on my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Way more comfy than the doctor's
customer_reviews.text: Since I went full time as an author, I did not learn my lesson in terms of pacing myself. I gave myself a major case of carpel and mouse elbow by writing two books in two months. (Yeah, not smart, I know.) The brace I got from the doctor was a huge pain and terribly uncomfortable, so I took a chance on this one and I love it. I sort of wish they came in different colors because the dove gray of this one will show dirt around the palm quickly. It's easy to clean, though, and dries quick. I need a few more. And please, make them in cool colors like red, blue and green. Even purple!
customer_reviews.author: A ChristyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Best Hand Supports Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got both left and right supports and love them. I need support for my wrists and thumbs. I have thumb supports, too, so switch back and forth between those and the Wellgates depending on what part of my hands and wrists are acting up. I have had to wear hand supports for about 20 years, and the Wellgates are the most comfortable supports I've ever worn and don't need any additional buffering to avoid irritation on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie L

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as great as I hoped...
customer_reviews.text: This fits, which is rare with my small wrists and average size hands. There is no support/compression actually on my wrist, which is what I need. In order for this to help on bad days, I will need to add a third strap. Also, there is a seam where the thumb hole is that is so rough that after about 30 minutes with it on I was starting to get abraded skin. For a loose support (like for sleeping), this will work fairly well, as long as I add a sock or something to protect my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Mangels

customer_reviews.title: Finally wrist support for women
customer_reviews.text: Fits well works great and comfortable contoured for a women's wrist. Reasonably priced and easy to clean. Not sold in pairs Need to buy individually for left and right wrists.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a perfect fit!! These are my fourth pair of wrist band supports that I’ve bought since getting CPS, and I was getting frustrated... they have all been too large, uncomfortable, too restrictive or not supportive enough. This Wellgate product is PERFECT! Fits comfortably, even to sleep in, and allows the support and flexibility I need to do my work every day (I spend a lot of time typing and also crafting). Most importantly, I have small wrists...and these fit wonderfully. It doesn’t hurt that they have a more feminine look to their style than I’ve seen, too. Definitely recommend if you’re having the same trouble I was!
customer_reviews.author: Kristan P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Won’t let me bend my wrist which is exactly what it’s supposed to do. I use these to sleep in and the foam inside is super comfy and these last a very long time. I actually wash them in a net bag in cold water and hang dry about once a month. Have been using these for years
customer_reviews.author: Dee S

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this but..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this brace. It’s low profile, great color and fits well. I don’t know if it’s just they way my wrist is small and boney, my injury is healing but after wearing this for 30mins my wrist hurting more. I think it’s putting pressure on my olecranon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Butterworth

customer_reviews.title: No more after work pain!
customer_reviews.text: When the pain after work got so bad I could hardly sleep, I decided to research how to stop it. A wrist brace is recommended. I have no experience with them, but glad I chose this one! I don't even have pain after work anymore with wearing this, getting an ergonomic keyboard, wrist rests, and being mindful of how I'm sitting and typing.
customer_reviews.author: P. Clark

customer_reviews.title: What a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I had had another wrist brace and it just didn't stop the pain. It moved around and I couldn't get it comfortable. Then I was browsing on Amazon and found Wellgate. What a relief!!!! It is a wonderful, fully supportive brace that fits my smaller hand and makes my tendonitis pain vanish. Thank You, Wellgate! so glad I found this brace!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them, I had them twice before only because one accidentally got broken but I bought a different kind because they didn't have both hands and I need both .... well those didn't last. I looked again and both hands were available so I grabbed them and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Harley-Day Hallman

customer_reviews.title: Great carpal tunel and wrist pain
customer_reviews.text: My dauther is on a wheelchair and has carpal tunnel which is not a good mix. This is the second one I got for her. She used to have this same model for her left hand and I bought her another brand (the one you can use for rigth/left hand) but the metal plate in the inside would bother her when she wheeled herself. Now she has one for each hand and she is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Echevarria

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO helpful with my carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product. I have carpal tunnel syndrome and at night I was constantly waking up with numb fingers and at times sharp pain. I have been using these for almost three weeks now and I haven't had any issues with the numbness/soreness during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the guy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for the husband - comfortable and restricted his wrist from twisting movements while cooking. One thing I would improve on is the straps are a tad short - prefer if the straps were long that I can cut shorter for chunkier hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support to palm as I had wished
customer_reviews.text: I really liked white/gray color and it one of only a very few not black!! I have a small hand but did not like that the metal support for palm did not seem long enough...I felt it did not support my palm and I kept trying to adjust it. If there had not been so much stiching at base of thumb I could have trimmed to fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HSA Eligible. Comfortable fit and durable. Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear this wrist splint at night. It stays put and is comfortable to wear. I have washed it in the washing machine but advise against it. Hand wash only so it keeps the stiffness. I have purchased approx 5 of these now and definitely like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Good for women especially petites
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad bit big but I'm smaller than the average female; at least it didn't cause my hand/wrist to go numb. The color is gray and has a white foam padding in the middle so that was a pleasant surprise since I read it was white. I don't want white cause it'll stain easier. I sleep with the wrist brace on and use it at working typing and computer work. It does help. I ordered the left and right side. I would give it a 5 if it fits better and the foam thicker for comfort when wearing it for a prolonged period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Phnx

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, effective, & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Preparing to buy a replacement after 3 years, only bc I throw it in the wash sometimes. I work in healthcare and have recommended this brace to folks since purchasing. Affordable and effective. Because it’s worth mentioning, I tried every brand at major retailers, paid more, didn’t see any improvement until I finally discovered this one! Wonderful quality and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Casspurr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great support
customer_reviews.text: I rely on my hands to make a living and I use them a lot for my hobbies as well so I try to take good care of them. I noticed my left hand started aching in the exact location that carpal tunnel flares up a few months ago and so I do stretches, rest them when possible, eat food to help with inflammation, and wear this brace at night. I do notice a difference when I wake up and my hand isn't pulsating in pain anymore. It's the perfect fit for my small hands, is soft yet firm for support, and is good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This is a replacement for the 2nd one that broke??
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these break the plastic inset.. This is a replacement for the 2nd one that broke??
customer_reviews.author: B Seger

customer_reviews.title: Support!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find a supportive brace that fits people with small hands. This gives support and comfort that I need for my pain relief! Would purchase again!!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It does help to stabilize- there are plastic inserts that keep wrist straight. However, the edges are scratchy and so I can only wear this for short periods. Disappointed as I was hoping the cloth parts would be soft, as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable For Typing
customer_reviews.text: Had some wrist issues from a lot of typing, so tried this out. Helps stabilize the wrist for sure, but limits the range of motion. I like the memory foam in it and seems to help with wrist plain. Comfortable, easy to use with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Q

customer_reviews.title: They are much more comfortable than the $20+ ones I bought at Walgreens
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for carpal tunnel. They are much more comfortable than the $20+ ones I bought at Walgreens, look better and are less bulky. The padding in the palm is also very nice. Strongly reccomend these. Great value for the price. Crazy how cheap they are when they are, in my opinion, better than the more expensive ones in the store.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyILM

customer_reviews.title: product works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because my right hand was falling asleep at night. It did help with waking up and no tingling. I was told I had carpel tunnel. I stopped wearing it and noticed my elbow was hurting very bad. It was to the point of pain while doing my hair and lifting. Last night I figured maybe the elbow and hand are connected in some way so I wore the brace. I woke up this morning with no pain at all in the elbow.
customer_reviews.author: Terilyn

customer_reviews.title: No more wrist pain!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a graphic designer who uses a pen & tablet to work. I noticed after long hours of work my wrist would be in a lot of pain, sometimes unbearable. I tried this wrist support and I have to say I'm so glad I did. It fits perfect and provides just the right amount of support with plenty of comfort. Yes, the color isn't the most practical one and can get a little dirty but it's really not an inconvenience at all. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Liz P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for women...
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect wrist braces for women! Women are made different than men and this is the only wrist braces made just for us. "Universal" braces are fine for short time injuries. However if you need braces every night, these are perfect. They keep you're wrist in a neutral position, which is what is required for relief from the awful numbness.
customer_reviews.author: mary buchanan

customer_reviews.title: It Works & It's Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had episodes of carpel tunnel inflammation over the years, and recently would awake to strong pain and tingling. Since purchasing this wrist support, I've had NO pain. None. I used wrist supports about 5 years ago that did not work and were stiff and uncomfortable. This wrist support is extremely lightweight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Bought Months Ago!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to sleep for about two months because my hands fall asleep at night (pregnant!) My very first night wearing this and they didn't fall asleep once! Fits great and is well designed. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Support!
customer_reviews.text: I love the support this provides to my wrist. I've tried many other brands but none have worked as great as this has. The reason tor only 4 stars is the color. It gets dirty very quick and requires constant washing which due to hand washing it, now it has water stains from air drying. I've only had it for a month or so and it already looks very worn out because of the need to wash it so often.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior with very small bone structure. I recently fell and injured my wrist, badly. After 4 other supports, I received this brace and in less than 12 hours I feel little to no pain. So grateful for the quality, comfort, color, pain free support, and cost. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This right-hand glove can help support my wife's hand to deal with her peritendinitis. It would be better if the left-hand glove is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Dr. recommended
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended these to sleep in as I was clenching hands at night. Keeps hands in natural relaxed position and does not interfere with sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Owned for years
customer_reviews.text: I've owned quite a few of these over the years. None have lasted longer than two years because the plastic inside snaps in half at the wrist. However, I am petite, so the slim fit is very nice. I can't imagine these holding up well if you use these during the day time. The plastic is fairly bendy. Also, they have changed the design in that the velcro straps are a lot shorter than they used to be, so the velcro has a hard time sticking tight unless you pull it very tight, which aggravates my carpal tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Roseola

customer_reviews.title: I definitely can say these are the most comfortable pair I’ve worn
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different brands because most have been uncomfortable and wake me in the night. I definitely can say these are the most comfortable pair I’ve worn. I reduced one star because the straps could be a couple inches longer. My wrists measure 7” and the lower strap barely has an 1” to fasten and the top strap 1 1/2” BUT there is 3-3 1/2” of Velcro left available. Please make the straps and inch longer for more flexibility and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: WHY REQUIRE TITLES
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my girlfriend, as she suffers from chronic carpal tunnel pain. Previously, she just used one of the black ones that you can buy at any Walgreen's or whatever (Futura brand, iirc). The difference between this Wellgate wrist support and the Futura is like night and day. The materials used in the Wellgate are light, soft, and breathable. Not only has this product helped alleviate her wrist pain, but her skin is no longer rubbed raw because of the harsh material used in making the wrist support. Just going by the happiness that I see in my gf, I have to give this product 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Viltrumite

customer_reviews.title: Came in good condition. It works and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Shipped in a very timely fashion. Came in good condition. It works and fits great. I can tell it would fit multiple hand/wrist sizes. Its flexible and comfortable but also offers a great deal of support. I have Carpel Tunnel and I wear it both at night and during the day at work when it flares up. It has been a huge help to me just in the last couple days I have used it. It also is made from good quality materials and you can tell its sturdy and will last. If anything changes I will update my review - but for now I am very happy with this wrist support.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mickles

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third type of wrist support and by far the most comfortable. I have to sleep in one on each arm at night due to sever carpal tunnel syndrome. These are cut lower on the palm so you have more mobility with your hand and your hand does not sweat as much as the full coverage one. It still keeps my wrist from bending but not so bulky. The price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find another brand
customer_reviews.text: Having needed wrist braces off and on for 20 years, this has been the worst. It is itchy, uncomfortable, and does not ease my symptoms. Went back to my previous brand (Futuro), which had been unavailable for a while, and it is so much more comfortable and effective.
customer_reviews.author: 4eyeslab

customer_reviews.title: Works really well for me
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for me. I'm a petite adult and most of the drug store wrist braces are too big to work for me. This one fits perfectly and is honestly the best one I've ever used. I purchased the right-hand one but I plan to buy the left-hand as well when I have some spare dollars. Love this item!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I damaged wrist and large bone on side of arm was painful to touch. This was only wrist support that didn't cause me pain. Took over 4 months to feeling better. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't hold up after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item . It was very comfortable and easy to sleep but now after over a month the velcro doesn't hold and comes open very easily. Now my wrist isn't stable. I would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Tight around the thumb!
customer_reviews.text: This wrist brace is elegant looking (compared to standard drugstore models) but it is still a wrist brace! Works pretty well, but I miss the elastic strap around the middle of the wrist that some of my other braces have had. My biggest criticism is that the thumb opening is very small. I had to phase the brace in slowly because otherwise my thumb joint was very irritated by the brace. I have very small hands (usually wear XS gloves) so I was surprised to have this problem. I would recommend looking elsewhere unless you need the aesthetic look of a grey/white brace.
customer_reviews.author: sparkster14

customer_reviews.title: Helped heal my wrist
customer_reviews.text: I began experiencing some pain in my wrist and purchased this to help. I wore it nearly every night and though it took a bit of time, it really helped me and made the pain go away.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Carpal and Tendinitis Sufferers
customer_reviews.text: This brace has been exactly what I needed to help ease the pain of both carpal tunnel and tendinitis and (unfortunately for me) what I'll be buying for my right wrist in the immediate future. It's soft, breathable, very comfortable and perfectly supports and stabilizes the wrist. I messed my wrist up crocheting and now type 40 hours a week for work but this prevents much of the pain. The only downside is that the fabric the velcro adheres to loses its integrity rapidly; I've used the brace for maybe six months and the connection is already very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sipos

customer_reviews.title: If you have small or short hands/fingers, these will probably work OK for you.
customer_reviews.text: These are a generic fit and do not fit me the way I would like the to fit. They actually become uncomfortable after a while, especially around the thumb area. They do seem to have helped my wrist pain even though I am not able to wear them every night like I planned. Next time I will go somewhere where I can try the support brace on before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brace for women! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brace that fit me well. All other braces were for men or were just too big or uncomfortable. I have bought this twice now and recommended it to friends. I use it for carpal tunnel and tendinitis. Helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Keen Eye

customer_reviews.title: Low profile
customer_reviews.text: This brace is comfortable to wear at night. It’s a lower profile and less bulky.its a rather light color. White and pink on the inside. Hope it stays clean. If I use it only at night it should be fine. Great support.
customer_reviews.author: Lise

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've found!
customer_reviews.text: After trying numerous wrist supports this is the best! This brace allows more freedom of movement without the pressure sore spots I exper with other supports. It is engineered to allow even the small size to go on easily without undue pressure on your already achy or sore hand but adjusts to a snug fit. It also is smaller than most braces I've tried and allows me to wear long sleeves and even rubber gloves in the kitchen, which I could not do with other braces
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Feels stable
customer_reviews.text: I bought about 5 braces in the months of May and June; this is by far my favorite. Gave my wrist a lot of stability without impeding my ability to type or perform other job functions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MaxJoBean

customer_reviews.title: less than a year, the steel bar reared its head
customer_reviews.text: While i can't say they weren't uncomfy, I was actually hoping to get some more mileage with them... considering the price difference with other leading brands is neglible.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Gave me so much relief from a pinched nerve!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed my friends brace to see if it would help my nerve pain/burning in my hand at night and it was such a relief that lasted through out the next day! So i immediately ordered one for myself! Unfortunately the wrong handed brace was sent. I needed and ordered the right but a left handed one was in the right handed box. I was so disappointed to have to wait and order another.
customer_reviews.author: Letia

customer_reviews.title: Good for temporary use
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your wrist stable enough to remind yourself to stop using your wrist. I have sore tendons from overusing my hands and work. 2 days of using this does the trick and I can take it off again.
customer_reviews.author: Synergy

customer_reviews.title: good product would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my right hand a few years ago for my carpal tunnel syndrome it fits very well on top of my pudgy little hand... However when I ordered the left-hand one from Amazon it seems to fit a little tighter... I should also mention that the seams cause irritation on the palms of my hands if I wear too many hours...but they look decent and it's a great price... And it does keep my hands from hurting... So I do recommend these for women
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hand splint
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible carpal tunnel syndrome & arthritis in my hands & wrists. This splint is the absolute best I have tried & I've tried at least 6-8 different one's. They one's I've gotten before were either too bulky, to stiff, heavy, inconvenient. etc. This one is lovely. Great support but does not interfere with using my hand as I need. It's lightweight (great for the summer heat), it's very easy to use & clean. I would absolutely recommend to anyone with carpal tunnel. I bough one for both right & left wrists
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Wristbrace with excellent flexible and under/over, yet firm support
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, very flexible, but still supportive. Cool firm support, but flexible enough to permit full movement for normal work, i.e., typing, writing lifting, etc. Product wraps securely and offers support above and below wrist and velcro has good grip with no unnecessary hanging pieces, and nothing extra to grab onto passing objects. Appears to be easy to handwash. I found this brace excellent because it gave firm all over support, without creating any areas that were overly tight or uncomfortable. Would recommend to any woman needing a smaller wristbrace. The others I used had an "under wrist metal support" that was far too long for a normal woman's hand/wrist.
customer_reviews.author: auntsuzy

customer_reviews.title: Wellgate Wrist Guard R hand
customer_reviews.text: Great. I feel like it needs a little breaking in I bought the same one at the local grocery store several years ago Only now found it at Amazon Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For A Woman’s Wrist
customer_reviews.text: This wrist brace is perfect for a woman’s hand. It is made for a woman and the fit is so much better than a generic one. Very supportive. It is only day one but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MK Monahan

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and used this splint in both the right and left hand fashions to help with my carpal tunnel which developed during my pregnancy. I used them while sleeping at night and during the day occasionally when it was feeling particularly rough. They work very well. My pain is noticeably worse the next day on the nights when I would forget to put them on before falling asleep. My one complaint is that the only color they offer is white and grey. I would have preferred black but that is simply an aesthetic preference and doesn’t affect my overall opinion and rating of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: If you're having issues with your wrist and just a comfortable brace to wear, I definitely recommend this. It worked on my right wrist last year so I just bought again for my left wrist when it was bothering me and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Gives good support but hard to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: Easier to secure and fasten than most, less bulky than most, and gives good support, HOWEVER, it gets dirty and smelly easily and you cannot put it in the washer. I finally relented and put one in the washer and dryer, and the splint insert broke the first time I did this. Then I decided to try another one in the washer only but that one broke immediately also. I think the only solution is to buy 2 sets so I can wear one set while the other is drying (takes a long time to dry because of the foam padding).
customer_reviews.author: Brennders

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and that it is made for women. However, as a plus-size woman, it is snug on my wrist. I would prefer a larger size but it only come in a standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Elsberry

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Velcro stuck to the sheets if not entirely attached, otherwise was super helpful for lessening the pain/prickles from my pregnancy induced carpal tunnel
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

product_meta.title: Wellgate for Women, PerfectFit Wrist Brace for Wrist Support, Right
product_meta.description: Style:RightWellgate™ PerfectFit Women’s Wrist Brace for Wrist Support is the solution for women suffering from carpal tunnel syndrome, weak, sore, aching, or injured wrists. The wrist brace helps to relieve pain and support wrist recovery. The Wellgate wrist brace is also ideal for general rehabilitation and provides intensive comfort throughout the day or night. The wrist brace is the answer for women in any setting, whether that be in the office, exercising, or sleeping. The wrist brace is specifically designed to fit the shape of a woman’s wrist and hand and to function according to a woman’s body mechanics. The PerfectFit design helps prevent gapping and chafing and the open finger design provides optimum range of motion. The advanced support technology in the hand brace helps relieve sore and aching wrists. The breathable fabric and adjustable straps allow for an easy one-handed application without any trouble. The wrist brace acts as a wrist cushion as it is made with comfortable memory foam and soft, breathable fabrics to supply the ultimate relief for wrist pain. A comfortable wrist brace will bring the best relief to aching wrists. The wrist brace is a solution to help alleviate wrist pain. Size Group: Adjustable; Fits: Right Hand; Material(s): Fabric; Memory Foam; Color(s): Soft Gray; White.
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE COMFORT. The memory foam provides everyday comfort in any setting. The wrist brace can be worn at work, home, or sleep to help provide ample nonstop wrist cushion comfort. The breathable fabric in the hand brace is perfect for women who need joint support while in the office, playing sports, or for general wrist strain

ULTIMATE DESIGN. The PerfectFit prevents gapping & chaffing and the design allows for one-handed application. Simply slide your hand into the brace with the thumb going through the hole. Tighten the straps and you are set! The ease of applying the wrist brace allows for quick comfort without any fuss.
Soft breathable fabric for everyday comfort: work, home or sleep.

WRIST SUPPORT FOR WOMEN. Wellgate for Women is the wrist brace made for women to provide comfort for sore wrists. The wrist brace fits most women and is available for both the right and left hands. The advanced support technology found within this wrist support brace helps provides the right amount of support and comfort during the day and night.

CARPAL TUNNEL SYNDROME . The Wellgate Advanced Support wrist brace is great for women who suffer from carpal tunnel and aching wrists. The brace may provide carpel tunnel relief, as well as relief from tendonitis. Tendonitis can cause stiffness and pain in the wrist, but Wellgate’s Perfect Fit wrist brace may help lessen the pain. The wrist support brace can also be used for general rehabilitation. The brace helps ease the pain and can be worn for day and night support.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
